definition: devoid of objectionable language, a substance that destroys micro-organisms that carry disease without harming body tissues
details:
adjective
- devoid of objectionable language
= example: devoid of objectionable language
- clean and honest
= example: clean and honest
- thoroughly clean and free of or destructive to disease-causing organisms
= example: thoroughly clean and free of or destructive to disease-causing organisms
- freeing from error or corruption
= example: freeing from error or corruption
noun
- a substance that destroys micro-organisms that carry disease without harming body tissues
